meanings.definition: The quality or state of being memorable.
meanings.sent1: The memorablenesses of the party made it unforgettable.
meanings.sent2: The memorablenesses of the vacation lingered in their minds.
meanings.sent3: The memorablenesses of the school play brought smiles to everyone's faces.
meanings.sent4: The memorablenesses of her words echoed in his heart long after she left.
meanings.sent5: The memorablenesses of the sunset painted a vivid picture in her mind.

meanings.sent1: The memorablenesses of their friendship were cherished by all.
meanings.sent2: The memorablenesses of the old photographs brought back happy memories.
meanings.sent3: The memorablenesses of the family recipe made everyone's taste buds dance.
meanings.sent4: The memorablenesses of the historic event were etched in the nation's memory.
meanings.sent5: The memorablenesses of the adventure filled their hearts with joy.
